body_html:
The inner handle of the tensor array should be the same through all iterations. The style is similar to _dynamic_rnn_loop in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py
(the TensorArray is written-to to yield a new TensorArray which is passed to the next iteration - the difference in my code is that the array is also read from).
body_text:
The inner handle of the tensor array should be the same through all iterations.  The style is similar to _dynamic_rnn_loop in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py
(the TensorArray is written-to to yield a new TensorArray which is passed to the next iteration - the difference in my code is that the array is also read from).
body:
The inner handle of the tensor array should be the same through all iterations.  The style is similar to _dynamic_rnn_loop in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/rnn.py
(the TensorArray is written-to to yield a new TensorArray which is passed to the next iteration - the difference in my code is that the array is also read from).
